display.title: Trinium
description: &&aTrinium&&r is a very important material for progression. You'll need it to make a &&9Fusion Reactor&&r, but it stays relevant all throughout &&cZPM&&r. We &&7(well, this particular questbook writer!)&&r can never have enough of this stuff.
It also requires an &&dLuV&&r EBF to smelt! Perhaps dedicate a setup solely for cooking this, unless you're confident that your infrastructure can deal with it.
&&l&&3Lore:&&r&&o In Stargate, Trinium was strong enough to block a point-blank C4 explosion. It's considered to be a hundred times stronger than steel, at only one-hundreth the weight.
